document.full_text: after derek jeter had a conference call with yankees officials to discuss his comments about jorge posada, the team blew a four-run lead against tampa bay.
document.title: rays 6, yankees 5: amid tension, yanks' slump hits 6
lines_and_colors: after derek jeter had a conference call with yankees officials to discuss his comments about jorge posada, the team blew a four-run lead against tampa bay.
